column2: Changed courses to take Advance functions. Advance to Data management.
Titan of the Month pass GO and collect $200
Congratulations! You made Honour Roll. Collect $50
You won a free Breakfast from HEART collect $50
Changed courses to take History. Advance to Iorio’s class
Raised money for Terry Fox Run. Collect $100
Went to the Arts Tour field trip. This card may be kept until needed or sold (free pass).
Went to look at artworks done by students. Advance to Fabora’s Class.
Changed courses to take Chemistry. move to Freda’s class
Changed Courses to take Com Sci. Move to Cadawas’ Class
Got a letter from your teacher. Use this card to get out of the principal’s office!
Finished your semester! Advance to Go.
Take a walk to Ms. Lee’s Physics class. You may have the option to buy this property if unowned.
Helped stacked the chairs after class. Collect $50 from each player!
Walked to Ms Salvino’s English class. if passed Go Collect $200
Late to school pay $25
Handed in an assignment three days late and received a 0% pay a $50 fine
Forgot to wear black shoes to school pay $25
Didn’t bring money for civvies day pay $30
Skipped more than 10 classes pay $50
Cheated on a test and got caught! Pay $100
Caught running in the hallways. pay a $30 fine
Broke chemistry lab equipment pay $50
Lost your math textbook pay $50
Cellphone went off during an exam pay $30
Skipped class pay $10
Failed to hand in an assignment pay $15
Forgot to use pen when writing out a physics lab pay $30
Didn’t throw out garbage at lunch pay $30
Got caught eating lunch in a stairway pay $20
